topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55086f136368721176590000#post_55086f136368721176590000
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]!https://36.media.tumblr.com/d7f6d5885624fd8c26f985ecd4206cd1/tumblr_naj263moUO1rhavdko1_500.png!

!http://rainiernew.wpengine.com/yurts/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2014/01/The_more_you_know_banner.jpg![/bq]
Today I freaking learned something

My puppies do this all the time and it's always baffled me until now

"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5508730b63687219dd5c0100#post_5508730b63687219dd5c0100
[bq="ToskiHero"]Well I just did something important today.

I went in this morning to meet with the English advisor and switched my major from Religious Studies to Film and Media Studies (like screenwriting). Originally I was going to do Creative Writing, but then I though about how much I could actually do or get done under that.

Gotta get though my spring classes first finishing up my time in Religious Studies first. After that, it's a whole new adventure for me. Let's hope it's a great one that leads me somewhere worthwhile. That, and EHAN will finally join me at college this Fall! -THE HYPE IS REAL-

As long as my spring classes don't kill me or screw me over, I don't have much to lose or worry about.[/bq]
College HYPE
